Package pathfinder

Interface Summary
AstarHeuristic Interface for all A* heuristic classes
IGraphSearch Any class that can be used to search the graph should implement this class.
 

Class Summary
AshCrowFlight This class is used to calculate the heuristic estimated-cost-to-goal.
AshManhattan This class is used to calculate the heuristic estimated-cost-to-goal.
Graph Objects of this class represents graphs that can be used in games.
GraphEdge This class is used to represent a directed edge between 2 nodes and the cost of traversing this edge.
GraphNode This class represents a node (vertex) that can be used with the Graph class.
GraphSearch_Astar A Star
Objects of this class are used to search a graph and find a path between two nodes using this algorithm.
GraphSearch_BFS Breadth First Search
Objects of this class are used to search a graph and find a path between two nodes using this algorithm.
GraphSearch_DFS Depth First Search
Objects of this class are used to search a graph and find a path between two nodes using this algorithm.
GraphSearch_Dijkstra Dijkstra
Objects of this class are used to search a graph and find a path between two nodes using this algorithm.
Message  
PathFinder This is a template class and can be used to start a new processing library or tool.
